rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {W}.)[/i]
Vedgard Stronghold enters tapped unless you control a Forest and an Island.
{2}{G}{W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Vedgard Stronghold: Search your library for a Fortification card, put it onto the battlefield, attach it to a land you control, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
